events.name: Token Design + Legal Challenges : Token Foundry x Norton Rose
events.description:
Join the Token Foundry and Norton Rose team for an afternoon gathering packed with personal insights and discussion about the Law & Crypto Assets and where the industry is heading. 
Alongside the founder of Token Foundry and partners at Norton Rose focussed on crypto, we will have personal insights from the founders of Weeve, Civil, Colendi, GamerToken and Balanc3 to share their learnings and takeaways around navigating the token design, token launch and crypto asset landscape. 
Light refreshments as you overlook a stunning view of Singapore from the 34th floor of Norton Rose SG.
Norton Rose Fulbright LLP is a global law firm with offices in over 60 cities around the world. We are at the forefront of legal thought leadership in Fintech, Blockchain Technology and Crypto Assets, and our practice offers a combination of deep global tech experience with regulatory and financial services knowledge. Our recent experience includes advising on cutting edge use cases of Crypto Assets and helping clients successfully navigate the legal and regulatory issues relating to this nascent industry. We represent start-ups, global financial institutions and investors alike across the sector.
events.location: Norton Rose Fulbright, 1 Raffles Quay, North Tower 34-02, Singapore 048583, Singapore 048583

events.name: Token Foundry x Ethereum Summer Meetup
events.description: Token Foundry x Ethereum SG : a showcase of top token projects: Weeve, Colendi Token Foundry, a formation of ConsenSys, is opening the doors of The Blockchain Hub to host a gathering with some of our top projects focused on the future of decentralised token-powered networks. Join us for founder talks, great food and beer and an evening of high quality networking with others in the Ethereum ecosystem. Guests of this gathering will be able to hear from founders of Token Foundry's hottest projects including Weeve Network and Colendi. We will talk about how token models are changing the world and the way we interact. This is is not only a unique opportunity to hear from these teams at the forefront of decentralised networks firsthand but also a stellar networking opportunity with a curated group of thought leaders from around the globe. Space is limited so please arrive promptly as talks with the founders will start at 6.30pm. Speakers:Harrison Hines, founder of Token Foundry will speak about how he formed Token Foundry and his role in helping the SEC create the regulatory standards for utility tokens in the United States.We will also be joined by the founders of three Token Foundry projects: Weeve IOT (Berlin based), Colendi (Turkey based), GamerToken (Berlin based), who will be able to share some insights on how their projects are taking shape. @tokenfoundry #TokenFoundrySG
events.location: The Blockchain Hub, 9, Temasek Boulevard, Suntec Office tower 2 - 7th Floor, Singapore

events.name: Live With AI: Understanding Human Needs Amidst the Rise of AI
events.description: Please register here, https://www.sginnovate.com/events/live-ai-understanding-human-needs-amidst-rise-artificial-intelligence Live With AI: Understanding Human Needs Amidst the Rise of Artificial Intelligence Presented by SGInnovate, Live With AI. Partnered with AXA, ESSEC Business School, French Tech Singapore, Lee Kuan Yew Centre for Innovative Cities, SUTD Live with AI’s key board members will present their research on the positive impact AI will bring to our society and business and highlight key recommendations to better live with AI. Learn more about the importance of a transparent interaction between Humans and Machines, the urgency to research AI new solutions that could protect and strengthen our human cognitive capacities instead of affecting them, the need to implement AI-driven banking services accessible to all to better plan their finance and future, the role CSR strategy may have in leading advanced manufacturing automation, in addition to innovative civics education and lifelong training models, or new metrics to better evaluate AI benefits to our society. Date: 3 July 2018Time: 6:30pm – 8:30pmVenue: BASH, Level 3, Block 79 Ayer Rajah Crescent, Singapore 139955 Programme:6:30pm – 7:00pm: Registration7:00pm – 8:00pm: Live With AI – Understanding Human Needs Amidst the Rise of Artificial Intelligence8:00pm – 8:30pm: Networking and End Speakers: - King Wang POON, Director, Lee Kuan Yew Centre for Innovative Cities- Eleonore ALESI, Senior Consultant, DATARAMA- Kevyn YONG, Dean, ESSEC Asia Pacific- Pierre ROBINET, Founder, LIVE WITH AI- Thomas JESTIN, Co-Founder and CEO, KRDS
events.location: BASH, 79 Ayer Rajah Crescent, Level 3, Singapore

events.name: The Future of Cyber
events.description: Yes, we have heard you. Yes, we know that good things are meant to be shared. So yes, we are finally in Singapore!! You know what you need to do. Now, keep the 3rd of July free! * For those who have already RSVPed on meetup, please note that you will still need to get your complimentary tickets here: www.cyberriskmeetup.com/futureofcyber In the spirit of community collaboration and sharing, your very own industry experts have set aside their time on this special evening for a two part segment: Part 1 - Bring your questions about the reality of the impact of the Cybersecurity Act on organisations! You will be hearing from your panel consisting of the APAC Chief Technology Officer, the APAC Head of Security Intelligence and the Co-Founder of a Leading Independent Security Consulting Firm. Part 2 - Interested in innovation, artificial intelligence, digital future and all things that sounds sexy? The future is nearer than we anticipate. Let’s find out how is Cyber evolving with the latest trends in a Ted-talk style presentation delivered by 2 renowned speakers: a Chief Information Security Officer & the ASEAN Practice Head of Artificial Intelligence. Hurry, there's only limited slots for this launch. Every single Cyber Risk events have always been over subscribed and full house. Be one of the one hundred to get your free ticket and enjoy an evening of great knowledge sharing, free food and drinks, and networking opportunities!
